PositiveConnections_GiftMessage.rulePack.li: giftMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 给了 [recipient_nameDef] 一份礼物: [giftDescription].
giftMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 把 [giftDescription] 当作礼物递给了 [recipient_nameDef].
giftMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 给了 [recipient_nameDef] [giftDescription] 以使他们的日子更加美好.
giftMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 作为友谊的象征赠送了 [giftDescription] 给 [recipient_nameDef].
giftMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 通过赠送 [giftDescription] 让 [recipient_nameDef] 笑了.
